pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Shiny' Based Record Linkage Tool // A bridge is created between existing robust open-source record linkage algorithms and an urgently needed user-friendly platform that removes financial and technical barriers, setting a new standard for data interoperability in public health and bioinformatics. The 'fastLink' algorithms are used for matching. Ted Enamorado et al. (2019) doi:10.1017/S0003055418000783.
